messages.subject: The pill
messages.msgSnippet: I got pregnant while taking the pill.  It didn t stop me from conceiving very good.  ;)  The pill is also designed to change the lining of the uterus so that
messages.messageBody:
I got pregnant while taking the pill. It didn't stop me from
conceiving very good. ;) The pill is also designed to change the
lining of the uterus so that if conception should occur, the baby
couldn't implant on the uterus a week later like it was supposed
to and would just starve as the yolk sac was used up. That aspect
of the pill failed for me too thankfully and I have a child to
show for it. :)
Had I known that my uterus lining was chemically changed to not
allow a pregnancy to implant if the first job of the pill failed,
I would never have taken the pills. It would go against my
personal beliefs.

Blessings,

Kandice
We will PAY you $500-$800+ mo. to stop POISONING your kids! ;) kandyc@...
